title: Lost and Found
description: Dr. Jonah Reid, aka Reid is married to his job. It’s the only thing he’s ever wanted in his life. Relationships always come second for him however, when Paige Reynolds is rolled into the emergency room after a tragic accident, he finds himself questioning everything he’s ever wanted.Paige Reynolds felt like she had everything, until a tragic accident rips everything from her including her memories. The only comfort she can find now is within the time spent with her doctor. Reid makes her feel safe during a time when she feels lost.As feelings develop between them, the situation becomes complicated. Reid holds the truth that Paige’s memories hold, but what happens when they all come back?
author: Stephanie Nichole
